voice.name: en-US-RyanMultilingualNeural
voice.lang: We're moving into the realm of transportation today. We'll learn how to buy a ticket, find the platform, and ask when the vehicle leaves in Japanese. Let's start with "One ticket to". In Japanese, that's

voice.name: en-US-RyanMultilingualNeural
voice.lang: . For example, if you're buying a ticket to Tokyo, you would say:

lang.mstts:prosody: 東京へ一枚のチケットを

voice.name: en-US-RyanMultilingualNeural
voice.lang: . And again, "One ticket to Tokyo" is:

lang.mstts:prosody: 東京へ一枚のチケットを

voice.name: en-US-RyanMultilingualNeural
voice.lang: . Next up, "Where is the platform?". In Japanese, you would ask:

lang.mstts:prosody: プラットホームはどこですか

voice.name: en-US-RyanMultilingualNeural
voice.lang: . Let's repeat, "Where is the platform?" is:

lang.mstts:prosody: プラットホームはどこですか

voice.name: en-US-RyanMultilingualNeural
voice.lang: . For example, if you're looking for platform 9, you'd ask:

lang.mstts:prosody: 9番のプラットホームはどこですか

voice.name: en-US-RyanMultilingualNeural
voice.lang: . Repeating, "Where is platform 9?" in Japanese is:

lang.mstts:prosody: 9番のプラットホームはどこですか

voice.name: en-US-RyanMultilingualNeural
voice.lang: . Finally, "What time does it leave?". This is translated as

voice.name: en-US-RyanMultilingualNeural
voice.lang: in Japanese. Again, "What time does it leave?" is:

voice.name: en-US-RyanMultilingualNeural
voice.lang: . For instance, if you're asking about the Tokyo train, you'd ask:

lang.mstts:prosody: 東京の電車は何時に出発しますか

voice.name: en-US-RyanMultilingualNeural
voice.lang: . Again, "What time does the Tokyo train leave?" in Japanese is:

lang.mstts:prosody: 東京の電車は何時に出発しますか

voice.name: en-US-RyanMultilingualNeural
voice.lang: . We've now learned how to ask for "One ticket to" as

lang.mstts:prosody: プラットホームはどこですか

voice.name: en-US-RyanMultilingualNeural
voice.lang: , and "What time does it leave?" as
